author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...CHANTAL NOW MOVING INLAND INTO FAR EASTERN SOUTH CAROLINA... ...FLASH FLOODING REMAINS A THREAT AS RAINBANDS PUSH ONSHORE...
summary: ...CHANTAL NOW MOVING INLAND INTO FAR EASTERN SOUTH CAROLINA... ...FLASH FLOODING REMAINS A THREAT AS RAINBANDS PUSH ONSHORE... As of 5:00 AM EDT Sun Jul 06 the center of Chantal was located near 33.6, -79.1 with movement NNW at 8 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1004 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...CHANTAL NOW MOVING INLAND INTO FAR EASTERN SOUTH CAROLINA... ...FLASH FLOODING REMAINS A THREAT AS RAINBANDS PUSH ONSHORE... title: Summary - Tropical Storm Chantal (AT3/AL032025)
